Isabella Rodriguez.description: serving customers at the cafe counter (preparing to-go orders) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:kitchen sink

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about conversing about a personal matter concerning their friendship @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus, I saw you working on your research paper earlier. How's it going?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, it's going well so far. I've been organizing my notes and gathering more research. How about you? How's your morning been?
Maria Lopez
My morning has been good. I just finished my morning routine and I'm about to head to Oak Hill College. Are you free later? I wanted to talk to you about something.
Klaus Mueller
Sure, I'm free later. What do you want to talk about?
Maria Lopez
I wanted to talk to you about something personal. Can we meet up after class?
Klaus Mueller
Of course, I'm available after class. Where would you like to meet?
Maria Lopez
How about we meet at Hobbs Cafe? It's a comfortable place and we can grab a snack while we talk.
Klaus Mueller
Sounds good! Let's meet at Hobbs Cafe after your class. I'll see you there.
Maria Lopez
Great, I'll see you at Hobbs Cafe after class!
Klaus Mueller
By the way, is everything okay? You mentioned that you wanted to talk about something personal.
Maria Lopez
I appreciate your concern, Klaus. There's something I've been wanting to tell you for a while now, and I thought it would be best to talk about it in person. It's about our friendship.
Klaus Mueller
Is everything alright? I value our friendship and I'm here to listen and support you.
Maria Lopez
I think it's best if we talk about it face to face. I'll see you at Hobbs Cafe after my class.
Klaus Mueller
Alright, Maria. I'll be at Hobbs Cafe at the agreed time. Take your time and we can talk when you're ready.
Maria Lopez
Thank you, Klaus. I appreciate your understanding. I'll see you at Hobbs Cafe after class.
Klaus Mueller
I'll see you at Hobbs Cafe after class. Take care, Maria.
